column1: The Purple Pig////What is meant to be
column3: and the Purple Pig was meant to be! First we stopped by Friday night and the 45m wait was not conducive to our touristy artsy fartsy plans for the evening. How foolish of me not to realize this was THE place to dine
column4: so no we did not not have resys or even the slightest idea of the wait time. However
column5: as the stars would have it
column6: we were able to walk in for an early dinner on Saturday and be seated right away.
